display.name: Rule Group Evaluation Rate
display.description: Shows the rate of rule group evaluations.

display.name: Rule Group Evaluation Failures
display.description: Shows the rate of failed rule group evaluations.

display.name: Rule Group Evaluations Missed
display.description: Shows rate of rule group evaluations missed due to slow rule evaluations.

display.name: Rule Group Evaluations Too Slow
display.description: Shows rule groups with evaluations taking longer than their set interval.

display.name: Alerts Sent
display.description: Shows rate of alerts sent by ruler.

display.name: Alerts Dropped
display.description: Shows rate of alerts dropped by Ruler when sending.

display.name: Alert Sending Errors
display.description: Shows percentage of alert sending operations that have resulted in errors.

spec.query:
sum by (namespace, job) (
    rate(thanos_alert_sender_errors_total{job=~"$job",namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])
  )
/
  sum by (namespace, job) (
    rate(thanos_alert_sender_alerts_sent_total{job=~"$job",namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])
  )

display.name: Alert Sending Durations
display.description: Shows p50, p90 and p99 durations for alerts being sent from the ruler.

display.name: Alert Queue Pushed
display.description: Shows the rate of alerts being pushed to sender queue.

display.name: Alert Queue Popped
display.description: Shows rate of alerts popped from queue, to be sent to Alertmanagers.

display.name: Dropped Percentage
display.description: Shows percentage of alerts dropped as compared to alerts being queued for sending.

spec.query:
sum by (namespace, job) (
    rate(thanos_alert_queue_alerts_dropped_total{job=~"$job",namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])
  )
/
  sum by (namespace, job) (
    rate(thanos_alert_queue_alerts_pushed_total{job=~"$job",namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])
  )

display.name: Unary gRPC Read request rate
display.description: Shows rate of handled Unary gRPC Read requests (StoreAPI).

display.name: Unary gRPC Read error rate
display.description: Shows percentage of errors of Unary gRPC Read requests (StoreAPI).

display.name: Unary gRPC Read duration
display.description: Shows duration percentiles of handled Unary gRPC Read requests (StoreAPI).

display.name: Stream gRPC Read request rate
display.description: Shows rate of handled Stream gRPC Read requests (StoreAPI Series/Exemplar calls).

display.name: Stream gRPC Read error rate
display.description: Shows percentage of errors of Stream gRPC Read requests (StoreAPI Series/Exemplar calls).

display.name: Stream gRPC Read duration
display.description: Shows duration percentiles of handled Stream gRPC Read requests (StoreAPI Series/Exemplar calls).

display.name: CPU Usage
display.description: Shows the CPU usage of the component.

display.name: Memory Usage
display.description: Shows various memory usage metrics of the component.

display.name: Goroutines
display.description: Shows the number of goroutines being used by the component.

display.name: GC Duration
display.description: Shows the Go garbage collection pause durations for the component.
